data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Ghanzi, Botswana into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ghanzi, Botswana
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Ghanzi, Botswana today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 12 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Ghanzi, Botswana.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Ghanzi, Botswana. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Ghanzi, Botswana a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Ghanzi. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ghanzi, Botswana has a population of 36,700.

We estimate Ghanzi has 3,030 people who might know Jesus, 21,014 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 12,656 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 12 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Ghanzi. Through your servants plant 7 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.
